## parseSize() function

Parses a byte size string into bytes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function parseSize(size: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  size | string | The size of anything in gigabytes, megabytes, kilobytes or bytes |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
